__e: You know, that first night they took the strongest of us, your quiet friend, three other guys.
'I love the fact that this is a silent order 'and I don't have to talk to her.'
Your dad says you've been quiet and you have no life outside of work.
"Slowly and slyly you've stolen my heart."
He was nice. He wasn't as quiet as you, though... but you two almost look like brothers.
He was always quiet, like he was hiding something.
